eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A REQUIRED WEEKLY TEST FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Clackamas; Columbia; Multnomah; Washington, OR; Clark, WA; AT 08:25 AM ON OCT 21, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 10:25 AM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: This is a required weekly test of the Emergency Alert System issued by Clark Regional Emergency Services Agency.
